title: Deploy OO Workflow Designer
content:
This section provides the steps required to install the OO Workflow Designer.

Before you install OO Workflow Designer:

  • Ensure that your system meets all the system requirements.
  • Ensure that you have Administrator privileges to avoid user access control (UAC) errors. If you aren't sure about your UAC settings, right-click on the installer and choose to run it as an Administrator.
